title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dreams.

title: Interstellar
description: A team travels through a wormhole in space.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family infiltrates a rich household, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub flees after his father's death and returns to reclaim his throne.

title: Gladiator
description: A Roman general seeks revenge after being betrayed and forced into slavery.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble to undo Thanos' destruction and restore balance to the universe.

title: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian's descent into madness leads to chaos in Gotham.
